label: arts, culture, entertainment and media
definition: All forms of arts, entertainment, cultural heritage and media

label: crime, law and justice
definition: The establishment and/or statement of the rules of behaviour in society, the enforcement of these rules, breaches of the rules, the punishment of offenders and the organisations and bodies involved in these activities

label: disaster, accident and emergency incident
definition: Man made or natural event resulting in loss of life or injury to living creatures and/or damage to inanimate objects or property

label: economy, business and finance
definition: All matters concerning the planning, production and exchange of wealth

label: education
definition: All aspects of furthering knowledge, formally or informally

label: environment
definition: The protection, damage, and condition of the ecosystem of the planet Earth and its surroundings

label: health
definition: All aspects of physical and mental well-being

label: human interest
definition: Item that discusses individuals, groups, animals, plants or other objects in an emotional way

label: labour
definition: Social aspects, organisations, rules and conditions affecting the employment of human effort for the generation of wealth or provision of services and the economic support of the unemployed

label: lifestyle and leisure
definition: Activities undertaken for pleasure, relaxation or recreation outside paid employment, including eating and travel

label: politics and government
definition: Local, regional, national and international exercise of power, the day-to-day running of government, and the relationships between governing bodies and states

label: religion
definition: Belief systems and institutions and people who provide moral guidance to followers

label: science and technology
definition: All aspects pertaining to human understanding of and methodical study and research of natural, formal and social sciences

label: society
definition: The concerns, issues, affairs and institutions relevant to human social interactions, problems and welfare

label: sport
definition: Competitive activity or skill that involves physical and/or mental effort and organisations and bodies involved in these activities

label: conflict, war and peace
definition: Acts of socially or politically motivated protest or violence, military activities, geopolitical conflicts, as well as resolution efforts

label: weather
definition: The study and prediction and reporting of meteorological phenomena

label: act of terror
definition: Act of violence often resulting in casualties designed to raise fear and anxiety in a population

label: armed conflict
definition: Disputes between opposing groups involving the use of weapons but not necessarily formally declared wars

label: war
definition: Armed hostilities by one group or geopolitical entity against another

label: civil unrest
definition: Rallies, strikes, demonstrations, riots or other disturbances by a population

label: peace process
definition: Organized actions to end a war or conflict usually involving peace negotiations and agreements

label: crime
definition: Violations of laws by individuals, companies or organisations

label: terrorism
definition: Violence against people to create fear in order to achieve political or ideological objectives

label: accident and emergency incident
definition: A sudden unexpected event that causes unwanted consequences or requires immediate action

label: disaster
definition: A sudden unplanned event that causes great damage or loss of life

label: natural disaster
definition: Destructive incidents caused by nature such as earthquakes and floods

label: business information
definition: Information about individual business entities including companies and corporations and charities

label: economy
definition: Production, consumption, distribution and trade activities affecting regions or countries as a whole

label: economic trends and indicators
definition: The behaviour and performance of the economy as a whole

label: parents group
definition: Group of parents set up to support educational activities of their children

label: school
definition: A building or institution in which education is provided

label: climate change
definition: All issues relating to extreme changes in climate including rising global temperature

label: conservation
definition: Preservation of the natural world such as wilderness areas, flora and fauna

label: environmental pollution
definition: The contamination of natural resources by harmful substances

label: disease and condition
definition: Any health conditions affecting humans

label: epidemic and pandemic
definition: A disease that affects a large number of people within a community, population or region

label: mental health and disorder
definition: The psychological well-being of an individual and the diseases and disorders that affect mood, thinking and behaviour

label: employment
definition: The state of having work usually paid for a company, organisation or individual

label: labour relations
definition: The relationship between workers and employers

label: election
definition: The selection of government representatives by the casting of votes by the populace

label: government
definition: The systems and institutions and people who run a political entity

label: government policy
definition: An overall plan or course of action set out by a government intended to influence and guide decisions

label: international relations
definition: Relations between nations through negotiation and treaty or diplomacy

label: biomedical science
definition: The application of biology-based science to medical fields

label: natural science
definition: The sciences that deal with matter, energy and the physical world

label: technology and engineering
definition: The study and practice of industrial or applied sciences

label: communities
definition: A group of individuals actively sharing a common value or interest

label: discrimination
definition: Unfair treatment of or policies or practices against individuals or groups of people

label: family
definition: A group of people related genetically or by a legal bond

label: social condition
definition: The circumstances or state of affairs affecting a persons life welfare and relations with others in a society

label: social problem
definition: Issues related to human rights, human welfare and other areas of societal concern

label: weather forecast
definition: The long or short-term meteorological prediction and reporting of the upcoming weather

label: weather phenomena
definition: Short or long-term meteorological phenomena worthy of study reporting or public advisory
